name: Fractional Homes Pte. Ltd.
description: Provider of a real estate management services intended to help small families to own their dream homes. The company assists customers to own a home by offering monthly rent as a share of homeownership, allowing customers to continue to build a portion of their future homeownership.
one_liner: Provider of a real estate management services intended to help small families to own their dream homes. The company assists customers to own a home by offering monthly rent as a share of homeownership, allowing customers to continue to build a portion of their future homeownership.
